title: SJVN's 900 MW project in Nepal to start power generation from 2025: CMD
description: SJVN expects its under-construction 900 MW Arun-3 hydro-electric project in Nepal to start power generation next year with 74% completion.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
